message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $80 for the product.
I understand you want to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $100.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $100 is still a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm sticking with my offer of $80. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
